name: Ridha Rahman
headline: Full-stack engineer focused on human-centered AI products
summary: Experienced software engineer specializing in building conversational AI assistants and data-driven web applications that help teams work faster.

skills.details: Expertise in JavaScript, React, Node.js, Python, and building retrieval-augmented generation systems with OpenAI APIs.
Skilled with Netlify, AWS Lambda, Docker, PostgreSQL, and CI/CD automation.
Comfortable leading cross-functional squads, mentoring engineers, and working directly with stakeholders.

bullets: Designed and shipped a customer support copilot that routes tickets through a Retrieval-Augmented Generation pipeline, reducing average response time by 37%.
Built end-to-end analytics dashboards in React and D3 that surface customer insights used by 200+ enterprise clients.
Led a modernization effort that migrated a monolithic Node.js service into serverless functions running on Netlify and AWS Lambda.
Implemented streaming chat interfaces in React for knowledge-base assistants supporting 10k daily active users.
Developed embedding pipelines that index product documentation and enable semantic search across 50k articles.
Collaborated with product and design to launch an onboarding assistant that increased trial-to-paid conversions by 14%.

projects.name: OpenHelp
projects.description: An open-source starter kit for building AI help centers.
highlights: Provides Netlify Functions for secure OpenAI access and caching.
Includes a React front-end with Tailwind CSS for customizable chat experiences.

projects.name: PulseBridge
projects.description: Healthcare analytics product that unifies EHR data into actionable insights for clinicians.
highlights: Implemented HIPAA-compliant data pipelines and React dashboards for hospital administrators.
Created proactive alerting workflows that notify care teams about anomalies in near real-time.

education.details: Research assistant in the interactive intelligence lab focusing on conversational agents.
